# Penetrating Strike (Feat)
## Overview
Your attacks are capable of penetrating the defenses of some creatures. Choose one type of weapon that you have already selected for [[Weapon Focus (Feat)|Weapon Focus]].

**Prerequisites**: [[Weapon Focus (Feat)|Weapon Focus]], base attack bonus +1, 12th-level fighter, proficiency with weapon.

**Benefit**: Your attacks with the selected weapon ignore up to 5 points of damage reduction. This feat does not apply to damage reduction without a type (such as DR 10/â€”).

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 131
